meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is curled or teased out from the head.
meanings.sent1: She styled her hair in a beautiful fro for the party.
meanings.sent2: Her fro looked stunning with the curls cascading down her back.
meanings.sent3: The wind played with her fro, making it look even more voluminous.
meanings.sent4: Her fro was like a fluffy cloud floating above her head.
meanings.sent5: The fro added a touch of elegance to her overall look.

meanings.sent2: The dog ran fro when it heard a loud noise.
meanings.sent3: She danced fro, trying to mimic a moonwalk.
meanings.sent4: The memories of childhood seem to fade fro as we grow older.
meanings.sent5: The sun sets fro, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink.
